attributes.action: Make it law for every employed person to receive a cost of living increase every year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
every year, people dont get a pay increase, even though the cost of living goes up.

every year, people on benefits get a cost of living increase.

i think, that every one employed, should also be intitled to a cost of living pay rise.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/costofliving/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
